sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特維斯集團尊重本網站訪問者的隱私。

sentences.english: Mr. Kamkar, however, said he did not create it to violate anyone’s privacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是Kamkar表示他沒有打算侵犯任何人的隱私。

sentences.english: What of concerns that we are sacrificing our privacy to marketers?
sentences.chinese: 將我們的隱私呈獻給市場營銷者有何意義？

sentences.english: The challenge is the boundary of personalisation and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 挑戰在於個性化和隱私之間的分界線。

sentences.english: PR8 Total number of substantiated complaints regarding breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data.
sentences.chinese: PR8違反客戶隱私及遺失客戶資料的申訴案總數。

sentences.english: The right to amend this Privacy and interpretation of treaties belong to the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本隱私條約的修改權和解釋權屬於本公司。

sentences.english: Albert enjoys privacy and he tends to do things on the sly.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯特注重隱私，做事總是很神祕。

sentences.english: The laws of libel, privacy, and copyright still apply in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 關於誹謗，隱私和版權的法律也適用於網絡空間。

sentences.english: The right of privacy embodies the dignity and the value of human being.
sentences.chinese: 隱私權作爲人格權的一種，體現了人的尊嚴和價值。

sentences.english: Thank you for visiting the EHC website and reviewing our privacy policy.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您瀏覽我們依合斯網站並關注我們的隱私政策。

sentences.english: Only The art newspaper has the right to revise or update the statement.
sentences.chinese: 此隱私聲明的修改及更新權均屬於本網站所有。

sentences.english: The move is a step-change for the activists too.
sentences.chinese: 對於隱私維權者而言，此舉也代表着逐步的變化。

sentences.english: In some countries, this is close to breaching privacy legislation.
sentences.chinese: 這在一些國家是接近違背隱私保護法規的行爲。

sentences.english: She tried to tease out some family problems from the boy.
sentences.chinese: 她試圖從小男孩的嘴裏套出一些家庭隱私。

sentences.english: For example, well spaced writing indicates someone who respects others' space and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 例如，字間距離恰當表明這人尊重他人的空間和隱私。

sentences.english: Website which has posted a Privacy Policy is one which you can trust.
sentences.chinese: 一個貼有隱私規定的網站值得你去信任。

definition: to disturb/to cause a commotion/to harass
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to offer for sale/to sell/to sell out or betray
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
